body_html:
I found the root cause is the command exec env - , this will cause the terminal exit normally in ubuntu.

Currently I have to compile some modules manually to work around it.

body:
I found the root cause is the command `exec env -` , this will cause the terminal exit normally in ubuntu. 

Currently I have to compile some modules manually to work around it.
